fullText:
Harried Recovery

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, battlemind, persistent harrier power
Benefit: The first time you drop to 0 power points during an encounter, you gain a use of your persistent harrier that you can use the next time an enemy hits or misses you with an attack during the encounter.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 137.
name: Harried Recovery
benefit: The first time you drop to 0 power points during an encounter, you gain a use of your persistent harrier that you can use the next time an enemy hits or misses you with an attack during the encounter.
